Writes values from input BED files into an in-disk HDF5Array

Source: R/read_beds.R
read_hdf5_data.Rd

Writes values from input BED files into an in-disk HDF5Array

read_hdf5_data(
  files,
  ref_cpgs,
  n_threads = 0,
  h5_temp = NULL,
  zero_based = FALSE,
  verbose = TRUE,
  meth_idx = 4,
  cov_idx = NULL
)

Arguments

files

The BED files to parse
ref_cpgs

The index of all unique coordinates from the input BED files
n_threads

The number of threads to use. 0 is the default thread with no cluster built.
h5_temp

The file location to store the RealizationSink object
zero_based

Boolean flag for whether the input data is zero-based or not
verbose

flag to output messages or not.
meth_idx

The column index of the methylation value for the read
cov_idx

The column index(es) of the read count

Value

List of HDF5Array. 1 is methylation, 2 is coverage. If no cov_idx is specified, 2 will be NULL

Details

Using the generated index for genomic coordinates, creates a NA-based dense matrtix of methylation values for each BED file/sample. Each column contains the meth. values for a single sample.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
#Do Nothing
}
